mixers.title: Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX4 Rekordbox & Serato DJ Compatible, 2-Channel DJ Controller
mixers.description: Includes rekordbox full version and Serato DJ Lite, Multi-device support,User friendly portable design and professional layout, Brand-new Smart Mixing features, Seamless integration with selected streaming services

mixers.title: Pioneer DJ DDJ-SR2, 2 Channel Serato DJ Controller
mixers.description: High quality built in soundcard, Includes full version of Serato DJ, Includes Pitch 'n Time expansion pack, Serato DVS upgrade ready, Slip mode, FX knobs and sync button

mixers.title: Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX6-GT, 4 Channel Rekordbox & Serato DJ Controller + Carry Bag
mixers.description: Support for various DJ software applications, Full-size jog wheels, Merge FX / Jog Cutter / Sample Scratch, Includes licenses for Serato FX Pack and Pitch ‘n Time DJ Expansion Pack, USB bus powered

mixers.title: Pioneer DJ DJC-FLX6 Carry Bag For The DDJ-FLX6-GT
mixers.description: Official Pioneer carry bag for DDJ-FLX6, Shoulder strap for easy transportation, Interior is packed with foam ensuring maximum protection, EVA Durashock Molded Body

mixers.title: Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol S2 MK3 DJ Controller + Traktor Pro 3 Full Version
mixers.description: Large smooth precision jog wheels, Mixer FX, instant one-knob FX/filter control per channel, 16 RGB pads for triggering Hotcues, Loops or Samples, 24-bit / 44.1 kHz audio interface, Includes the brand new Traktor Pro 3 software

mixers.title: Denon Prime GO, 2-Channel, Battery Powered Standalone DJ Controller
mixers.description: Fully-featured, backpackable 2-deck smart DJ console, 7-inch HD touchscreen with gestures, Rechargeable lithium-ion battery for up to 4 hours of unplugged performance, Built-in Wi-Fi and wired internet connectivity for music streaming, Dual-bank performance pads for triggering hot-cues, loop and roll No-compromise, pro-grade audio and connectivity RCA aux input for media players, tablets and phones

Speakers.title: KRK Rokit RP7 G4 (Pair) + Isolation Pads & Leads Bundle
Speakers.description: Built-in efficient Class D power amp, Proprietary speaker drivers built in-house from the ground up, Onboard LCD visual DSP-driven EQ, 25 visual Graphic EQ settings for different environments, KRK App with Room Correction Tools

Speakers.title: Mackie Thrash 215 Active Portable PA Speaker (Single)
Speakers.description: 1300W (peak) ultra-efficient Class-D amplifier, Built-Like-A-Tank™ to conquer every gig while lightweight for easy loading, Straightforward inputs and outputs, Pole mount it or use it as a floor monitor, Equipped with 4 handles for easy loading

Speakers.title: Pioneer DJ DM-40D White, 4 Active Monitors for DJ'ing or Production
Speakers.description: High quality sound, DJ'ing or production modes, Bass reflex system, Multiple input options, Super clean audio at any volume

Speakers.title: KRK Rokit RP8 G4 (Pair) + Monitor Stands + Leads Bundle
Speakers.description: Includes Desktop Monitor Stands with adjustable height and tilt, Excellent quality balanced audio leads of your choice included, Built-in efficient Class D power amp, Onboard LCD visual DSP-driven EQ, 25 visual Graphic EQ settings for different environments

Speakers.title: Mackie CR3X Active DJ Speakers + Cables Bundle
Speakers.description: Includes ProTools First DAW software, Choose which side of your desk gets the volume knob with the convenient speaker placement switch, Convenient front panel volume knob with on/off/volume control, Plug your smartphone or other source into the 1/8” Aux input and listen instantly, 50 watts of clean, articulate stereo sound

Speakers.title: KAM RZ15ABT, 15 Active Speaker with Bluetooth (Single)
Speakers.description: Built-in amplifier for direct connection to mixers & sound sources, Multiple audio inputs for mics and instruments with easy-to-connect Bluetooth® input, Compact chassis designed for PA and sound reinforcement, Curved trapezoid chassis and unique handles for horizontal placement as a stage monitor, Built-in media player - plug in USB sticks and SD cards for MP3 playback

headphones.title: Numark HF175 DJ Headphones
headphones.description: High-quality 40 mm Neodymium magnet drivers for powerful, pure sound, Soft synthetic leather ear pads with stitched synthetic leather headband for long-lasting comfort, Closed-ear design for optimum sound isolation and accuracy, Stainless steel adjustable headband and Manganese steel framework for maximum strength and longevity, 180-degree rotatable frame for single-ear monitoring and portability

headphones.title: Pioneer DJ HDJ-CUE1BT-W DJ Headphones With Bluetooth (White)
headphones.description: Bluetooth built-in, High-quality sound, Built to last, Comfortable design, Customizable ear-pads and cables (sold separately)

headphones.title: Sennheiser HD25 Pro DJ/Monitoring Headphones
headphones.description: Very comfortable and great sound isolation, Left cup twists to make djing easy, Cable is easily replaceable, Amazing sound quality and very durable, The professional DJ's favourite

headphones.title: V-Moda Crossfade 3 Wireless Headphones Bronze Black
headphones.description: Very comfortable and great sound isolation, Left cup twists to make djing easy, Cable is easily replaceable, Amazing sound quality and very durable, The professional DJ's favourite

headphones.title: Austrian Audio Hi-X50 Pro On-Ear Closed Back Headphones
headphones.description: High excursion proprietary drivers, All metal hinges and bow for maximum durability, Detachable cable, Foldable construction, Soft slow retention memory foam earpads

headphones.title: Numark HF125 DJ Headphones
headphones.description: ​Flexible 7-position independently adjustable dual ear cups, Large 40mm mylar speaker drivers, 6ft tangle-resistant cord, Padded headband and ear cups, Suitable for 3.5mm or 6.3mm connections

controllers.title: Allen & Heath Xone K2 Professional DJ Midi Controller
controllers.description: For use with any midi mappable software, Built in audio interface, Includes case which also acts as a stand, Very robust build-quality, X:Link for connecting multiple units

controllers.title: Akai MPD218 USB/MIDI Pad Controller with Ableton Live Lite
controllers.description: Includes Ableton Live Lite and MPC Essentials, 16 MPC style pads, iOS compatible ( Camera connection kit sold separately), USB powered, no power supply required, Perfect for live performance and producers

controllers.title: Native Instruments Traktor Kontrol F1 for Remix & Stem Deck Control
controllers.description: Dedicated control for Stems and Remix Decks, Includes £44 voucher for Native Instruments site, Free 2GB of remix decks packs , Full colour RGB pads and filter on each channel, Lightweight for travel

controllers.title: Novation Launchpad Pro MK3, Production Grid Controller For Ableton live
controllers.description: Deepest Ableton Live Integration, Logic Live Loops integration, Powerful Four-track, 32-step Sequencer, Chord Mode, Dynamic Note & Scale Modes

controllers.title: Reloop Neon, Serato DJ Modular Pad Controller
controllers.description: Official Serato Accessory: plug-and-play with Serato DJ, Supports the brand-new Serato Flip extension pack, Censor, slip and sync functions for all decks can be selected directly with the controller, USB bus-powered, Works with every MIDI compatible DJ or studio software

controllers.title: Pioneer DJ DDJ-XP2 + Rekordbox DVS & Timecode Vinyl Bundle Deal
controllers.description: Rekordbox DJ & DVS licence key included, Supports Serato DJ Pro & DVS (available separately), Support for Silent Cue mode in Serato, Support for Transport mode in Rekordbox, Serato's first ever official 16 pad controller

cables.title: Oyaide NEO HPC-HD25 V2 for DJs, Replacement Cable for HD25 Headphones (Black)
cables.description: Super high quality - 102 SSC cable conductor, 1.8m length for better on-site DJ capabilities, Gold plated HD25 side pins for improved sound quality, Cable conductor and plug soldered with lead, PVC coated outer sheath for flexibilty and durability

cables.title: QTX Lighting DMX Cable, 20 metre (177.913UK)
cables.description: 3-Pin XLR for DMX, High-quality, Shielded, Highly flexible cable, Accurate and noise free, Ideal for use over long distances

cables.title: Alto Stealth Wireless MKII Expander, Additional Receiver (Single)
cables.description: Use to expand your existing Stealth Wireless MKII system, Single-channel receiver with one 1/4” TRS output (per unit), Reliable UHF band; up to 100+ selectable channels (regionally dependent), Adjustable squelch eliminates interference

cables.title: Stagg MIDI-MIDI 2 Metre Cable (SMD2)
cables.description: Great quality audio cable, 2 metre length, ROHS compliant, For connecting audio equipment, Black cable  with metal connections

cables.title: av:link RCA-RCA with Ground Wire for Turntables, 1.2 Metre (109.543UK)
cables.description: Good quality audio cable, Balanced connection, 1.2 metre length, For connecting audio equipment with a ground wire, Phono (or RCA) for Turntable

cables.title: Oyaide Neo d+ TXM Class B , 1/4Phone-XLRm 1M, Pro Audio Cables
cables.description: Super high quality, Pure oxygen free copper conductor, Flat cable prevents distortion, Durable PVC outer for good flexibility, 24k gold plated bronze alloy coating
